contact.descr: Would you like a PWA for your company?

pwa.pageTitle: PWA / Web App ‚Äì Web Application Development | KSIBE

hero.title: PWA / Web App
hero.subtitle: Transform your website into a full-fledged mobile app. Home-screen icon, offline mode, and push notifications ‚Äî without App Store costs.

card1.title: Home-Screen Icon
card1.text: Users can install your app in one click directly from the browser. Your brand is always at hand on their phone screen.

card2.title: Instant Speed
card2.text: PWA caches the interface, so pages load instantly, even with a very weak internet connection.

card3.title: Offline Mode
card3.text: Users can browse your product catalog or contact information even without network access.

card4.title: Push Notifications
card4.text: Bring users back to your app by sending reminders about promotions, orders, or news.

card5.title: Perfect for Google
card5.text: Unlike native apps, a PWA is fully indexed by Google, bringing new customers from search.

card6.title: 70% More Cost-Effective
card6.text: One codebase for Web, iOS, and Android. No need to pay for developing three separate product versions.

info.title: Who Needs This?
info.list1: Online stores: Increase repeat sales using push notifications.
info.list2: Delivery services and taxi apps: Quick one-click access to placing an order.
info.list3: Media and blogs: Readers can access content even in the subway without internet.
info.list4: Startups: Fast MVP launch across all platforms at once.

modal.successText:
Thank you for trusting us with your ideas.
We are already reviewing your request and will contact you shortly.

website.pageTitle: Websites of Any Complexity ‚Äì Website Development | KSIBE

hero.title: Websites of Any Complexity
hero.subtitle: From simple pages to well-structured multi-level websites. For brands, small businesses, or companies ‚Äî we deliver clean, fast, and result-focused solutions.

card1.title: Responsive Design
card1.text: Your website will look perfect on any device ‚Äî from smartphones to large monitors.

card2.title: High Performance
card2.text: Optimized code and images for instant page loading (Google PageSpeed Green Zone).

card3.title: SEO Optimization
card3.text: Basic SEO setup, proper tag structure, and metadata for better Google ranking.

card4.title: Easy Content Management
card4.text: We connect a convenient CMS so you can update content and images without a developer.

card5.title: Data Security
card5.text: SSL setup, spam and attack protection, regular backups.

card6.title: Clean Code
card6.text: We write modern, valid code that is easy to maintain and scale.

info.title: What do we build?
info.list1: Landing Page: A one-page website for fast promotion of a product or service.
info.list2: Corporate Website: A multi-page site for presenting your company.
info.list3: Product Catalog: A product showcase without online payment (or with).
info.list4: Promo Websites: Bright, animated websites for marketing campaigns.

contact.descr: Ready to discuss your new website?

ecommerce.heroSubtitle: A convenient store with a cart, online payments, and modern design. Functionality that truly converts and remains stable under load.
ecommerce.card1Text: A thoughtful UX/UI flow from selecting a product to completing payment in just 2 minutes.
ecommerce.card2Text: Integration of payment systems (LiqPay, WayForPay, Stripe) and Apple/Google Pay.
ecommerce.card3Text: Synchronization of products, stock levels, and prices with your CRM or Google Tables.
ecommerce.card4Text: Fast search and convenient filtering by features, brand, and price.
ecommerce.card5Text: Integration of Google Analytics 4, Pixel, and full conversion tracking.
ecommerce.card6Text: A store that loads quickly even with thousands of products. Critical for retaining customers.
ecommerce.infoList1: Retail business: Clothing, electronics, cosmetics, home goods.
ecommerce.infoList2: Instagram brands: Automated sales without manually answering ‚Äúprice?‚Äù.
ecommerce.infoList3: Wholesale companies (B2B): Closed catalogs, wholesale pricing, and dealer dashboards.
ecommerce.infoList4: Dropshipping: A fast launch without your own warehouse.

corporate.heroSubtitle: A stylish and solid website for your company. Showcases your brand, team, and services ‚Äî ensuring clients see professionalism at first glance.
corporate.card1Text: Your website works for your reputation 24/7. Modern design communicates that your company keeps up with the times.
corporate.card2Text: A clear and convenient service catalog or business structure, helping partners quickly find what they need.
corporate.card3Text: Sections for presenting key employees and an HR block to attract new talent.
corporate.card4Text: Company news, case studies, reports, and events for investors and clients.
corporate.card5Text: Content adapted for different markets and languages for seamless international cooperation.
corporate.card6Text: Enhanced security, DDoS protection, and full GDPR compliance.
corporate.infoList1: B2B companies: For attracting partners and wholesale clients.
corporate.infoList2: Legal and consulting firms: To demonstrate expertise and team capabilities.
corporate.infoList3: Construction & Real Estate: Property catalogs and portfolios of completed projects.
corporate.infoList4: Holdings & Corporate Groups: To present business structure and reporting.
corporate.contactDescr: Shall we discuss your corporate website?

crm.pageTitle: CRM and Client Dashboards ‚Äì System Development | KSIBE
crm.heroSubtitle: We build intuitive tools for business operations: dashboards, management systems, service panels. Everything is well-structured and easy to use.
crm.card1Text: Free your team from routine tasks. The system automatically generates reports, issues invoices, and sends task reminders.
crm.card2Text: All key business metrics at a glance. Clear charts and dashboards for informed decision-making.
crm.card3Text: Role-based access control. A manager sees only their requests, while the director sees the full picture.
crm.card4Text: We make complex systems simple. Your staff will not need a month to learn how to use it.
crm.card5Text: Optimized databases and queries. The system runs instantly, even with millions of records.
crm.card6Text: We connect your CRM with the website, telephony, email, banks, and delivery services.
crm.infoList1: Client dashboards: Order history, bonuses, personal data.
crm.infoList2: CRM systems: For sales teams, customer tracking, and deal management.
crm.infoList3: ERP systems: Enterprise resource management (warehouse, logistics, finance).
crm.infoList4: LMS platforms: Systems for online employee training and testing.
crm.contactDescr: Need a CRM for your business?

custom.pageTitle: Any Idea / Startups ‚Äì Web Development | KSIBE
custom.heroSubtitle: Even if it is something unconventional ‚Äî let‚Äôs discuss it. Whatever you imagine, we can build! From a startup MVP to complex ecosystems.
custom.card1Text: Rapid launch of a minimum viable product to validate your hypothesis without massive investments.
custom.card2Text: Need a complex calculator, product configurator, or booking system? We will build it from scratch.
custom.card3Text: Integration of artificial intelligence (ChatGPT, Midjourney API) or blockchain solutions into your project.
custom.card4Text: We can connect your service with any API: banks, logistics, warehouse systems, CRM, and more.
custom.card5Text: Architecture designed for high loads. From 100 to 1,000,000 users without system failures.
custom.card6Text: We are not limited by templates. We select the technology stack that perfectly fits your task.
custom.infoList1: Startups: From a napkin idea to a product ready for investment.
custom.infoList2: Online services: Aggregators, marketplaces, classifieds, booking platforms.
custom.infoList3: Automation: Bots for Telegram/Viber, data parsers, automation scripts.
custom.infoList4: IoT & Hardware: Web interfaces for managing smart devices.
custom.contactDescr: Got an idea? Let‚Äôs bring it to life!

babies.heroTitle: How to turn a new kindergarten into the most popular one in the area
babies.heroDesc: A comprehensive launch for Babies Alliance. We built a trust-driven website and set up advertising that brought parents in. The result ‚Äî fully booked groups in 2 months.
babies.structDesc: We didn‚Äôt just create pages. We built a funnel that addresses parents‚Äô concerns.
babies.structItem1Desc: A mandatory section in today‚Äôs reality. Photos and videos of the shelter to eliminate the main concern.
babies.structItem2Desc: Menu examples and quality certificates. Your child‚Äôs health is the top priority.
babies.structItem3Desc: Meet the educators. People trust people, not logos.
babies.structItem4Desc: Class schedule: English, sports, creative activities. We show real value.
babies.structItem5Desc: Map integration and clear directions for parents.
babies.structItem6Desc: Transparent pricing policy. No hidden fees increases trust.

pidvezu.heroTitle: Find travel companions easily with Pidvezu
pidvezu.heroDesc: Platform development from scratch: from database architecture to a React frontend. We built an ecosystem where drivers and passengers find each other in minutes. The result ‚Äî convenient savings of time and money.
pidvezu.structDesc: A comprehensive solution combining a web interface, admin panel, and messenger automation.
pidvezu.feat1Desc: Trip matching algorithm by date, time, and route with advanced filtering.
pidvezu.feat2Desc: Bot for new trip notifications and fast communication with support.
pidvezu.feat3Desc: Driver moderation system and real-time trip analytics.
pidvezu.feat4Desc: Intelligent trust score calculation based on successful trips.
pidvezu.feat5Desc: Instant seat booking with automatic status updates and history.
pidvezu.feat6Desc: Ultra-fast SPA interface for instant page loading.

head.heroTitle: A premium look for the Head Barbershop brand
head.heroDesc: Redesign of an outdated website that was losing clients. We built a fast React landing page in dark tones, integrated it directly with the CRM, and launched advertising campaigns. The result ‚Äî a steady flow of leads and easy booking in just 2 clicks.
head.chartSub: Comparison between the old website and the new landing page
head.structDesc: We transformed a slow and unstable website into a powerful lead generation tool.
head.feat1Desc: Seamless integration with booking platforms (Altegio/Yclients). Clients see available time slots in real time.
head.feat2Desc: A strict, premium visual style. Clear navigation instead of the chaos of the old website.
head.feat3Desc: Instant loading on mobile devices. No freezes that previously scared clients away.
head.feat4Desc: Interactive service menu. A clear pricing structure helps clients make quick decisions.
head.feat5Desc: The website is optimized for local search queries like ‚Äúbarbershop [city]‚Äù.
head.feat6Desc: Launch of ad campaigns targeting high-intent queries for rapid customer acquisition.
head.nextCaseName: Wortly ‚Äì Smart service for learning German words

wortly.title: Wortly ‚Äì German Learning App
wortly.heroTitle: Learn German effectively with Wortly.one
wortly.heroDesc: A social project by the Ksibe team. A free app with a complete set of tools ‚Äî from spaced repetition to native pronunciation. Your personal assistant for mastering German.
wortly.chartSub: Growth of the user's active vocabulary
wortly.structDesc: All essential tools for language immersion ‚Äî right in your pocket.
wortly.feat1Desc: Add your own words and organize them by topics. Full cloud synchronization.
wortly.feat2Desc: Flashcards and tests for reinforcement. Track progress in real time.
wortly.feat3Desc: iOS: Real human voices. Android: High-quality AI speech synthesis.
wortly.feat4Desc: A spaced repetition algorithm adapts to your memory level.
wortly.feat5Desc: Ready-made word sets ('Food', 'Travel', etc.) and daily 'Word of the Day'.
wortly.feat6Desc: Detailed error analytics help identify weak points.

allCase.heroDesc: We combine design, technology, and marketing to build products that transform the market.
allCase.descWortly: German learning app with AI-powered voice
